original_text: The other things that happened while Asa was king are written in a book. The book is called ‘The history of Judah's kings’. It tells about Asa's power and all the great things that he did. It also tells about the cities that he built. When Asa became an old man he had a disease in his feet.
korean_text: 아사의 남은 사적과 모든 권세와 그가 행한 모든 일과 성읍을 건축한 일이 유다 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐 그러나 그는 늘그막에 발에 병이 들었더라

sentences.original_text: The other things that happened while Asa was king
sentences.korean_translation: 아사가 왕으로 있던 동안 일어난 다른 일들

sentences.original_text: and all the great things that he did
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 한 모든 위대한 일들

sentences.original_text: It also tells about the cities that he built
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 또한 그가 건설한 도시들에 대해 말한다

sentences.original_text: When Asa became an old man
he had a disease in his feet
